## Bug Description
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

## Steps to Reproduce
1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error

## Expected Behavior
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

## Actual Behavior
What actually happened, including any error messages or logs.

## Environment
- OS: [e.g. Windows 10, macOS 12]
- Browser/Node version: [e.g. Chrome 96, Node.js 16]
- Project Version: [e.g. v1.0.0]

## Additional Context
Add any other context about the problem here (screenshots, links, etc.).
